name: Moon Intern
blurb: Space! Love! Exploration! Action! As the newest heroic Moon Intern! Fix Machines, Deliver Packages and Fight Evil! Love your Soulmate!

rewards.reward: THANK YOU!  A copy of the full game upon it's release.

You get a copy of the game, PLUS you become a TESTER.  This summer we will begin releasing test builds of the game for our testers.  You'll be helping us make the game in one of the most crucial ways...making sure it's fun!
REQUESTED: You'll get the game, become a tester, PLUS a digital copy of the soundtrack!
You'll get the game, become a tester, PLUS we'll ship you an AWESOME quality big poster of the world map and a digital copy of the soundtrack!  Please add $10 for international shipping.

BECOME A CHARACTER! 
Your personality and likeness will be used to create a standard character of our choice to live and work on the Moon.

Plus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your personality and likeness will be used to create a character who works at MOONCO.  MoonCo is the largest corporation on the Moon.\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create a character who works at LUNATAT.  Lunatat is a company who will go to any means to please their investors to become the "top" corporation on the Moon.\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create a character who works at STARWAY LABS!  You've always wanted to be a space scientist, right, riiight!?  Now is your chance!\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create a character who works for COMMAND.  These are the people who protect the Moon from any threat.\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create a character who is a PILOT!  The most popular way to travel in the colony is by using it's wonderful public transit system.  You could appear as a MoonBus pilot, a Resort Shuttle pilot or anyone else who flies a space ship!\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create a POLITICAL character.  You could be the Secretary of Caves, or the Treasurer of Tourism, or even the Secretary of Moon Sanitation! \r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!
BECOME A CHARACTER!  Your likeness and personality will be used to create the MOON PRESIDENT!  What an honor!\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER! Your likeness and personality will be used to create one of the SHOP OWNERS in the colony. We'll even let you name your shop and help decide the wares you want to stock! Plus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A MAJOR CHARACTER! Your likeness and personality will be used to create a MAJOR STORY CHARACTER! These will be characters seen frequently in the game, like Mentors and Enemy Leaders. Plus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER! Your likeness and personality will be used to create a SPECIAL CHARACTER! These are people like the Blimp-Billionaire, Spy, Sheriff, Junk-yard owner, Head-chef, Ghost hunters, ect . Plus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!\r\n\r\nPlus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER! Your likeness and personality will be used to create a member of either the ACTION or TECH SQUADS. These characters will appear more than any others. Plus you get a copy of the game and become a tester!

BECOME A CHARACTER!  You and your real life soulmate or special one will have your likeness and personalities turned into the GARDEN OWNERS on the colony.  You both get a copy of the game and become testers of course!.

DELUXE HAND CRAFTED PHYSICAL COPY OF THE GAME!  We will craft this one of a kind work of art, and imbue it with all the love, action and exploration of Moon Intern itself.  Plus you'll get to be a tester, get the poster, soundtrack and you'll be made into a VERY special character in the game.
